channel.title: CVE Feed for Sam Lantinga and Mattias Engdegård -- Simple DirectMedia Layer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Sam Lantinga and Mattias Engdegård -- Simple DirectMedia Layer

item.title: CVE-2017-12122|2024-09-16T22:40:57.754Z -- sam%20lantinga%20and%20mattias%20engdeg%C3%A5rd -- simple%20directmedia%20layer
item.description: An exploitable code execution vulnerability exists in the ILBM image rendering functionality of SDL2_image-2.0.2. A specially crafted ILBM image can cause a heap overflow resulting in code execution. An attacker can display a specially crafted image to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-14442|2024-09-16T16:49:04.589Z -- sam%20lantinga%20and%20mattias%20engdeg%C3%A5rd -- simple%20directmedia%20layer
item.description: An exploitable code execution vulnerability exists in the BMP image rendering functionality of SDL2_image-2.0.2. A specially crafted BMP image can cause a stack overflow resulting in code execution. An attacker can display a specially crafted image to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-14449|2024-09-16T19:56:21.232Z -- sam%20lantinga%20and%20mattias%20engdeg%C3%A5rd -- simple%20directmedia%20layer
item.description: A double-Free vulnerability exists in the XCF image rendering functionality of SDL2_image-2.0.2. A specially crafted XCF image can cause a Double-Free situation to occur. An attacker can display a specially crafted image to trigger this vulnerability.
